text: We ordered a variety of different yakitori which included very delicious barbecue sticks of chicken ball, pork, pork and asparagus, spicy chicken karage, and chicken with green pepper. These were paired with a rice set A. The portions served were quite filling and very much worth the price. The serving of the dishes was quite good too, very organised and good looking. The rice served together with the meats was very well cooked and delicious especially with their addictive brown sauce. The location of this Tori-Q stall is very convenient to due it being in a shopping centre Plaza Singapura and in close proximity to the entrance to the MRT station.
Support this store for more than 10yrs. Love to grab it whenever I go home after work. Now not working anymore, bring my kids here again. Yummy they love it too.

standard tori q outlet, but have to say the service by auntie at counter was very subpar. She yelled at us to quickly make our order and ruined our experience. otherwise usually get the chicken ball and cheese sausage, those don’t disappoint

Yummy & tender yakitori💕
✔I ordered chicken skin yakitori and pork yakitori. Both are delicious!
✔The atmosphere was nice, near the MRT.
✔The Service was great, they serve quickly👍
Like this place. Fresh, quick, tasty and portion is good enough 😉but I doubt appreciate some more vegetables on the side. Attaching pictures for reference, enjoy 😋
